Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Analyze the DECLARE Model I need to parse the dictionary to understand the process flow Lets map the activities and relationships Init ReceiveApplication This is the starting point Existence ReceiveApplication GatherAdditionalDocuments must happen Absence ProceedWithoutCompliance must not happen Exactly One PreliminaryCreditCheck must happen exactly once Response ReceiveApplication PreliminaryCreditCheck Succession PreliminaryCreditCheck GatherAdditionalDocuments Coexistence GatherAdditionalDocuments AuthorizeContractTerms Responded Existence AssembleLoanOfferPackage QualityAssuranceReview Precedence QualityAssuranceReview AuthorizeContractTerms

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: ChainPrecedence AuthorizeContractTerms PreliminaryCreditCheck If Auth happened Prelim must have happened first It is a constraint ensuring integrity audit trail ChainSuccession QualityAssuranceReview AssembleLoanOfferPackage Precedence QA Authorize Succession Prelim Gather Altsuccession Gather QualityAssuranceReview

Name: Hypothesis Generation - IND
Text: Hypothesis The model might have a typo However the prompt asks to Explain Alternative interpretation ChainSuccession links a specific state of QA to the final assembly Or perhaps the model is enforcing a specific workflow where QA happens and that causes the assembly of the final documentation

Name: Backtracking - PE
Text: Wait thats weird AuthorizeContractTerms Late stage PreliminaryCreditCheck Early stage Correction Refinement Assemble refers to the act of collecting the raw data for assembly Wait look at the constraint names Scenario The model says QA happens then Assemble BUT Assemble QA is also true Resolution for Narrative Interpret Assemble as Drafting the offer and QA as Reviewing the draft

Name: Abductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Synthesize the Process Flow Chronological 1 Start ReceiveApplication Init 2 First Action PreliminaryCreditCheck Response to Application 3 Next Action GatherAdditionalDocuments Succession to Prelim Check 4 Decision Point After Gather QualityAssuranceReview Altsuccession AuthorizeContractTerms Coexistence Precedence QA Authorize 5 AssembleLoanOfferPackage ChainSuccession 6 TransferFunds ChainResponse 7 NotifyCustomer AltResponse Altprecedence

Name: Validation - PE
Text: SelfCorrection during drafting The Noncoexistence constraint is Transfer Receive I missed that in step 1 Need to mention that Receive must stop before Transfer Precedence QA Authorize makes QA a hard prerequisite

Name: Counterfactual Reasoning - PE
Text: Consequences of Violations Omission Funds disbursed without checking docs Fraud risk legal liability Bad Order Authorizing before checking credit Disaster granting loan to deadbeat Illegal Coexistence Transferring without Notify Customer confusion legal claims

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - IND
Text: Drafting the Content Introduction Acknowledge the model and the goal StepbyStep Description Inception ReceiveApplication Screening PreliminaryCreditCheck Data Gathering GatherAdditionalDocuments Authorization Phase QualityAssuranceReview AuthorizeContractTerms Finalization Assemble Transfer Notify Discussion of Constraints Motivations Regulatory Fraud Risk Quality Consequences of Violations Structure Process Overview Detailed Workflow Constraint Analysis Business Motivations Consequences of Violations
